1: <pb/><e>Bital ofrenda yin aloj yuj diosalil</e> <pb/><t>Yin tzalojc'ulalil chex bitni bay Dios e masanil ex cajyom bay sat tx'otx'.</t>
2: <t>Aek ay e ba bay Jehová yin tzalojc'ulalil. Titanek satak Cham yin aw yet tzalojc'ulal.</t>
3: <t>Chi cam e yojtaknen elok, tol a Jehová Dios toni. A' max on watx'neni, cax yet on, is conobal on, axca wal tol is calnel on Cham, xan taynebil on yuj.</t>
4: <t>Sebaxek bay puertail is templo, ocanek yul yamak'il templo Cham. Bitnanek yin aloj watx' k'anej bay. Alek yuj diosalil bay Cham, c'al e yalon watx' k'anej bay.</t>
5: <t>Ilab tol watx' Jehová. A is camc'ulal Cham ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, cax c'am chi bek yunen tzet chi yala'.</t>
